nodes.text: Phetaril was a form of spice.

Following the death of Jabba the Hutt, the talented Pa'lowick singer Sy Snootles left the Max Rebo Band, certain of her own fame. When each of her three subsequent album releases tanked, she adopted the pseudonym "Lips Teenek" and toured a string of seedy bars along the Outer Rim Territories. Snootles acquired a lifelong spice addiction when she met a Spiner named Quilsen, who introduced her to phetaril spice.
